ModuleTitle: Grant Writing and Writing for Publications
Department: Nursing/Alice Lee Ctr For Nursing Stud
ModuleDescription: This module will provide students a practical approach in appraising the process, steps and rigor in academic writing; grant writing and writing for publications. It will enable students to draft funding proposals for their graduate studies, and draft manuscripts for publications. The topics include principles of academic writing, common problems in academic writing, and good style in academic writing.
